summary: Implement a geo-targeted feature flag system for progressive delivery with real-time analytics. Core capabilities include location-based user segmentation (country/region/city), percentage rollouts, dynamic flag management via admin portal, and real-time Geo-IP resolution. System must provide dashboards for adoption metrics, error monitoring, and automated alerts with one-click rollback (< 30 seconds). Compliance requirements include GDPR/CCPA adherence, user opt-out options, and full audit trails. Dependencies include authentication service upgrades and BI stack integration (Snowflake/Looker). Success metrics: <0.2% error rate, 72-hour adoption tracking per geo-segment.
